Text: Deployment of Balancing Energylast weeks RUG meeting I was asked to prepare a brief description of what is in ESCAs current design for deployment of Balancing Energy Service I hope the attached document is what you were expecting I have also included some design notes I found on the issue of ERCOT operators name and receiving operators names in the dispatch instruction Let me know if additional detail is needed Dispatch Instructionsdoc Trip Doggett ERCOT Dispatch Instructionsdoc
